DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study assess effect Dry Needling Myofascial Trigger Point compare Dry Needling Taut Band point base outcome myotnometric measurement healthy subject . Hypothesis : Deep Dry Needling latent medial Myofascial Trigger Point ( MTrP ) soleus muscle achieve change myotonometric measure compare Deep Dry Needling Taut Band soleus muscle .
DOC.brief_title: Can Myotonometry Quantify Dry Needling Effectiveness Myofascial Trigger Points ?
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : It double-blinded randomized clinical trial subject healthy volunteer city Toledo old 18 year . There MTrP Group ( dry needle medial MTrP soleus muscle ) TB Group ( dry needling distal MTrP taut muscle band soleus muscle ) . The intervention unique session . Intervention : Dry needling technique perform locate taut band Myofascial Trigger Point . Depending group , thin needle ( 0,32x40mm ) introduce 10 time ( fast fast ) directly within Myofascial Trigger Point within Taut Band . Assessment : Myoton device simple portable tool obtain quantitative objective assessment mechanical property muscle tone . Myoton adopt characterize viscoelastic property skeletal muscle tissue displacement mechanical perturbation apply muscle . The device incorporate probe acceleration sensor . The probe keep perpendicular end touch muscle belly . 10 mechanical impact ( duration 15 m , force 0.4 N local deformation order millimetre ) deliver MTrP TB point . Outcome measure : Outcome measure include myotonometric measurement ( frecuency , stiffness decrement ) evaluate , 10 min 1 week intervention .
DOC.criteria: Age range 1840 year . Healthy volunteer . Presence latent medial MTrP soleus muscle . Being able provide write informed consent . Being able follow instruction realize clinical test . Any history ipsilateral low limb severe injury intervention ( e.g . fracture , surgical intervention ) . Pain musculoskeletal injury , ligament injury , tendonitis plantar fasciitis ipsilateral leg six month previous intervention . Peripheral central nervous system neurological disease . Altered sensitivity treatment area . Treatment myofascial trigger point sural triceps six month previous intervention . Changes physical activity would affect muscle tone study . Fear needle . No tolerance pain cause dry needling . No continuance commitment .
